abstract: An effort by the U.N. to draw attention to the fact that the global population is now or soon will be 7 billion sowed confusion on Monday, as some reports conflated a projection with an exact count.
snippet: An effort by the U.N. to draw attention to the fact that the global population is now or soon will be 7 billion sowed confusion on Monday, as some reports conflated a projection with an exact count.

headline.main: Global Population Reaches 7 Billion, or Doesn't
